channel.title: NYS:MANU on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:MANU on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Manchester United Falls Further Behind Rivals Financially
item.description: Manchester United, the Premier League’s fallen giant, is struggling to keep tabs with its larger rivals after revenues flat-lined and losses continued to mount.
